title: Text summary
description: Represents a text summary of an article, consisting of whether this summary is approved, the model used, the last generated date, the model text, and the display text.

model.description: The text generated by the AI model

display.description: The edited text to be displayed to the reader

model_id.description: The model used to generate this summary

last_generated_date.description: The timestamp this summary was last generated
